index.feature-1-text: Satria BIPA provides Indonesian learning with a cultural context as insight and information about various Indonesian traditions, customs and cultural values.
index.feature-2-text: Satria BIPA recommends Indonesian learning subjects related to user questions, difficulty level adjustments, and tips for learning Indonesian.
index.feature-3-text: Practice speaking through text in the form of natural conversation in Indonesian to enhance self-confidence and fluency in speaking Indonesian.
index.watch-video: Watch the following video tutorial to use Satria BIPA
